abstract: Virgin Mobile, the lesser-known wireless carrier owned by Sprint, is opening its flagship retail store on Thursday in Chicago. The company says that it is aiming to build awareness of its brand by redefining the relationship between the customer and the carrier.

headline.main: Virgin Mobile to Open Flagship Retail Store on Thursday
